items.value: No special properties. The place Zorpster sends you is at his spawn point.
Increases your max run speed and lowers your max walk speed, and disables stamina regen as long as you have stamina!
Collect balloons to keep the timer from ticking to zero! Collecting in combos gives you more time!
Balloons appear around the school, the player and NPCs must pop them to avoid getting detention!
